title: dimonstration
author: dimonstration
content: This is my first time experiencing this kind of long winning streak for playing blackjack for a long time. I started my balance at 100$ and ended with 322$  due to this crazy long run of winning streak and some side bet win.I'm only using minimum bet this time because I don't want to change my momentum once I increase my bet which affect my decision making. My previous record was 10 winsteak before this but this time I voluntarily stop gambling since the dealer already shuffle the deck for 2 minutes which I believe I might lose when I still continue.What's your longest winning streak in Blackjack? You can share here your record such as screenshots to inspire other player.

comments.author: Findingnemo
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 10:59:58 AMWhat's your longest winning streak in Blackjack? You can share here your record such as screenshots to inspire other player.I am not really a blackjack player, I'm more of a dice roller and my most winning streak is probably with 6 or 7 consecutive wins at most.I just want to remind you that sharing the winning streak of your's and others are not supposed to inspire and try to replicate the same because its a known fact that gambling is just a matter of luck with a little bit of skill in games like Blackjack still you can't ensure that you can win unless you do the trick of counting cards which is against the casino rules.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: Findingnemo on September 28, 2023, 11:15:29 AMQuote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 10:59:58 AMWhat's your longest winning streak in Blackjack? You can share here your record such as screenshots to inspire other player.I just want to remind you that sharing the winning streak of your's and others are not supposed to inspire and try to replicate the same because its a known fact that gambling is just a matter of luck with a little bit of skill in games like Blackjack still you can't ensure that you can win unless you do the trick of counting cards which is against the casino rules. Haha, I’m not a card counter and it’s impossible to do that with the way they continuously shuffling their deck after using half of their cards. Card count usually effective when most of the card is already being use since you have a lot of data for the remaining card. I memorized the basic strategy and to calculate the odds of getting high card using some strategy. I can only assure minimize loss most of the time but I can’t guarantee either huge win.I said to inspire because I was on some point that doubting about credibility of live games blackjack when I’m still newbie and continuosly losing. I want to inspire those person to play without doubting the provider integrity so that they can focus on the game.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: As card-games player who love playing (Live-game)It's so sad, that you're not using martingale-momentum stats. You should raise a bet around 1,5-2x in-case you want to gamble these streak with 2 table you should can ended with more than 2,000$ or maybe more.Just so sad seeing these.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: I do not know what to post because I am not a fan of blackjack, I prefer Roulettes and Dice instead. I do not play often. If I win once in a day, I do not play again. If I lose, I keep on using martingale strategy up to 5 times in a way that anytime I win, I make the money for the day and I will stop gambling for that day. So this do not let me have a certain way to have a long winning streak.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on September 28, 2023, 12:19:34 PM-snip-Your odds are not good.Especially on (Roulete) we preferer baccarat/bj, it's card game even the house can take edge by cutting some card but comparing to roulete there has some mechanism they set-up the magnet and landed to number with less money.That's why, people love card game rather than roulete.

comments.author: xLays
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 10:59:58 AMhttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/09/28/PFiml.jpegThis is my first time experiencing this kind of long winning streak for playing blackjack for a long time. I started my balance at 100$ and ended with 322$  due to this crazy long run of winning streak and some side bet win.I'm only using minimum bet this time because I don't want to change my momentum once I increase my bet which affect my decision making. My previous record was 10 winsteak before this but this time I voluntarily stop gambling since the dealer already shuffle the deck for 2 minutes which I believe I might lose when I still continue.What's your longest winning streak in Blackjack? You can share here your record such as screenshots to inspire other player.As far as I can remember my longest winning streak in Blackjack was 7. I'm unable to provide a screenshot since it happened years ago, but it's still fresh in my mind because such win streaks are rare for me when it comes to gambling. And still ended up losing all those winnings from the winning streak.Anyway congrats on your profit and longest winning streak on Blackjack!

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on September 28, 2023, 12:13:28 PMAs card-games player who love playing (Live-game)It's so sad, that you're not using martingale-momentum stats. You should raise a bet around 1,5-2x in-case you want to gamble these streak with 2 table you should can ended with more than 2,000$ or maybe more.Just so sad seeing these.Actually, I’m a bit depressed too when I see the result but I decided to forget about and just focus on my current so that I will not feel regretful since I already have profit. Now that you mention it, I’m already regretting for not increasing my bet.  Seriously speaking, I usually increase my bet whenever I’m on the momentum. I decided to stick on fixed bet this time because I’m busy chatting on the dealer most the time throwing some cheezy text. The wait time is very quick since this is speed so I decided on fix bet rather than be confused due to time panic.

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 04:46:39 PM-snip-Hahaha, you can always raise the bet.Maybe people like you who are worried lose a lot, raising a bet for 1,2 is already enough just don't to be stuck on the same number unless you're on losing momentum. This rally are really rare.Sometimes you need a lot lose several weeks.

comments.author: topbitcoin
comments.body: Unfortunately I wasn't that lucky, getting a winning streak in that game. However, I have a small message for you, hopefully in the future you will be wiser in the gambling games you play and you will still be able to control your emotions when playing.Why do I say this, because there are quite a few people who get consecutive wins but they cannot enjoy the results of their gambling because they run out again in the next gambling game.And we need to realize that luck doesn't appear every time we play, even if you have had a winning streak, it's just a coincidence which will probably be very difficult to repeat a second time.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: It's always good to experience a winning streak, it might not always happen but when luck hits you, expect a better result.I just have a small winning streak and its not on a blackjack since I rarely play this game. Will probably try this again and hoping to have the same luck.Are you able to get that profit out or you continue to gamble with other game? Better not to be more greedy and enjoy that profit for now.

comments.author: lionheart78
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 10:59:58 AMThis is my first time experiencing this kind of long winning streak for playing blackjack for a long time. I started my balance at 100$ and ended with 322$  due to this crazy long run of winning streak and some side bet win.I'm only using minimum bet this time because I don't want to change my momentum once I increase my bet which affect my decision making. My previous record was 10 winsteak before this but this time I voluntarily stop gambling since the dealer already shuffle the deck for 2 minutes which I believe I might lose when I still continue.What's your longest winning streak in Blackjack? You can share here your record such as screenshots to inspire other player.This is an impressive run! This is luck coupled with experience.  Contratulation on the winnings@OP.I only happen to have at most 3 to 4 winning streaks in blackjack.  Since I often try to decide on a risky move whenever I am at more than 2 winning streaks.  I often stand when I have 16 in hand and that is mostly beaten by the host.

comments.author: arallmuus
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 10:59:58 AMWhat's your longest winning streak in Blackjack? You can share here your record such as screenshots to inspire other player.5 and this include two times winning side bet with a pairProbably the best BJ run I've had the entire year. It was a table with 4 players playing iirc and its pretty rare for me to play in a table that has players that actually understand the basic BJ strategy. Normally I would find an idiot that would hit on 13/14 when dealer has 6 on his hands thus ruining the momentum when he got that 10 for his hands then dealer managed to win somehowAnyway its pretty rare for a speed blackjack table to be having only 2 players in it, normally its pretty packed

comments.author: ryzaadit
comments.body: Quote from: arallmuus on September 28, 2023, 10:45:41 PM-snip-As you see the number of rooms was really high.Rooms that have full-player with low-stakes most of the time with the lowest number, If you looking for fewer players with low-stakes really recommended with high number/capital like more than 25-30 or after number O.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: I am for the first time seeing such numbers and I agree with what have been said above,in such winning situations you could have tried martingale by raising your bet to also raise your profit.It is rare as I said to see someone winning this long in Blackjack and that is an amazing achievement.Nevertheless though I would agree to stop playing table games or card games as in the end they are all based on luck and we know in the longer term luck is not on our side,always not on our side when we keep playing longer and longer.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.created_time: September 29, 2023, 05:05:10 PMLast edit: September 29, 2023, 05:26:00 PM by dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: ryzaadit on September 28, 2023, 08:41:34 PMQuote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 04:46:39 PM-snip-Hahaha, you can always raise the bet.Maybe people like you who are worried lose a lot, raising a bet for 1,2 is already enough just don't to be stuck on the same number unless you're on losing momentum. This rally are really rare.Sometimes you need a lot lose several weeks.Just in, Not that long win streak from my previous one but this time I manage to increase my bet per win from 5$ until 15$ bet. I manage to profit almost 200$ this time through this quick game with consistent win. I never thought to experience this kind of luck consecutively within just a week of betting. I believe this win streak will continue if evolution gaming brings back the continuous game without 2 minutes shuffle on their 5$ min bet game.  I’m very lucky on trying new casino for a change of gambling ambiance. This shit works like  miracle to me.  Quote from: arallmuus on September 28, 2023, 10:45:41 PMQuote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 10:59:58 AMWhat's your longest winning streak in Blackjack? You can share here your record such as screenshots to inspire other player.Anyway its pretty rare for a speed blackjack table to be having only 2 players in it, normally its pretty packedI'm playing with full packed player most of my game in there. They are just leaving since I'm the only one winning while the rest is losing. Players keep changing tables that time. Only one player that is same with that consistent on betting regardless of the lose streak.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 10:59:58 AMSweet win! My longest winning streak is only 9 but my bet amount at that time is insane so I get a huge profit despite my streak is much lower. New update of evolution gaming offers already a cashout feature that let you save your winning streak count if you have a bad hand. I think this feature makes easier to achieve that kind of streak now compared before when your only choice is to stand or gamble hit when your card is so bad. Congratulations to the win. I'm still not playing the new version in long session become cashout sometimes destroy my strategy. I will try to beat your streak once i have a chance to play tomorrow or next week.

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: Coin_trader on September 30, 2023, 05:59:32 PMQuote from: dimonstration on September 28, 2023, 10:59:58 AMNew update of evolution gaming offers already a cashout feature that let you save your winning streak count if you have a bad hand. I think this feature makes easier to achieve that kind of streak now compared before when your only choice is to stand or gamble hit when your card is so bad.Yeah, This feature is a life saver for the winning streak but it’s still hard cashout while there’s no certainty that the dealer card will be bad. This cash out feature is only available on Stake casino before but now most of the evolution gaming blackjack table has this kind of feature which is available on the settings of evolution.Sometimes this feature makes me confused on what’s strategy I will use especially when I cashout while the dealer has a bad card which I will not do if I’m not protecting my streak. This feature sometimes very expensive if use wrong.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: dimonstration on October 01, 2023, 02:05:45 PMSometimes this feature makes me confused on what’s strategy I will use especially when I cashout while the dealer has a bad card which I will not do if I’m not protecting my streak. This feature sometimes very expensive if use wrong.This is the dilemma on using early cashout feature. Your mind will be on the state of confusion while you cashout on dealer 10 then later on faced up a total of 16 below and bust. You will be confused if you will cashout or not which is very painful if you are an overthinker while the decision time is very short.I usually turn off this feature when gambling casually so that I will not have extra decision to make that will make me confused. I’m only using cashout feature whenever I bet huge amount and want to play safe. I’m still not playing for a while due to rest after winning big time last week. Just want to not jinx my charm.

Also what a number to stop on lol, if you know, you know.For me the longest winning streak is something like 9 wins in a row i think. It happened a few years back in a crypto casino of some sort. I remember because they started delaying my withdrawal and while waiting i managed to bust it all
